description: &&7[Tinkerer's Quilt]&&r There are alternative recipes for &&dLeather, Slimeballs, and Glow Ink Sacs&&r that don't require killing their respective mobs. &&dArrows&&r can also be scavenged from &&cskeletons&&r.
&&7[Fabrication]&&r Villagers will &&drotate their stock every day&&r: You're more likely to see special items, but &&dcan't buy them infinitely&&r.
&&7[Tinkerer's Smithing]&&r There are recipes to &&dupgrade&&r equipment to better materials at the &&3Smithing Table&&r - or the &&3Crafting Table&&r for &&3unenchanted&&r gear.
There are also matching recipes to &&drepair&&r equipment at the &&3Anvil&&r or the &&3Crafting Table&&r, costing no experience or work.
Additionally, equipment that with an &&3enchantment&&r or a custom name can be &&drepaired after it breaks&&r
Finally, equipment can be &&dde-worked&&r one stage using &&3Netherite Scrap&&r at an &&3Anvil&&r, making adding enchantments &&dcost less experience&&r.
